&dhpackage;
Terminal-based remote package update manager
&dhpackage;
[-c config]
DESCRIPTION
This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; command.
&dhpackage; is a program to manage package updats on a large number of remote hosts using SSH.
OPTIONS
&dhpackage; accepts the following command parameters:
-c config
Use alternative config file. Default is $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/apt-dater/apt-dater.conf.
ENVIRONMENT
MAINTAINER: The maintainer's name used by debtrack on the managed hosts.
SEE ALSO
aptitude(1), apt-get(1), debtrack, screen(1), ssh(1).
